div.ab: For one who cannot urinate, that comes from the kidneys: Take cold leaf(???) and crush it(?) and take out the juice and drink the juice in a hot bath, and the urine will come forth.

Another thing: Rub the penis in rabbit fat that is called in German "KÃ¶niglin" (little king/prince), and the urine will come forth. Another thing: Take living silver(?) and mix it with hot wine, and drink it and the urine will come(???) with God's help.
If you want a woman not to become pregnant: Hang on her neck the feces of a rabbit. As long as the feces is on her neck.

For the uterus of a man (Zucker says, prostatic utricle): Take the feces of a donkey in a linen cloth, and in a small bag, and boil it with white wine, not strong, and the best quality that can be found, until it is as hot as you can stand, and put the bag (with?) the cloth and feces in it on the the spot that hurts, and it will calm, and quiet, and be healed, with God's help. Received from Rabbi Matosman, who saw it [done?] by a certain doctor in Piran.
